The '''House of Caspar''' was a prominent family in [[Fontaine]]. Local to the town of [[Poisson]] and well trusted for their fairness and reliability,<ref name="Aeval">{{Ref/NPC|Aeval|note = Aquabus dialogue}}</ref> they were renowned as the leaders of the [[Spina di Rosula]]<ref name="WARTTW">{{Ref/Quest|When All Return to the Waters}}</ref> and key figures in the construction of the [[Aquabus]]es which bear the family's names.<ref name="Aeval" /> Following the death and disgrace of the family's patriarch [[Callas]], he was succeeded as Spina di Rosula president by his daughter, [[Navia|Navia Caspar]].<ref name="WARTTW" />
